story.text: Still enjoying it. Logistics are not a challenge for remote work yet. But, easy to focus on no-work related matters. I hope that I produce docs up to snuff for Tom.
Really enjoy walking around Red Lodge and shopping for property. Time to get pre-approved for a loan from the bank.
